feature.name: WebSphere Application Server Liberty Profile Tools
feature.description: Tools for developing and administering WebSphere Application Server Liberty Profile

feature.name: Geronimo v1.0 Server Adapter
feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapter and additional development tools for Apache Geronimo.

feature.name: Geronimo v2.2 Server Adapter
feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapters and additional development tools for the Apache Geronimo v2.0, v2.1 and v2.2 servers.

feature.name: Geronimo Core Feature
feature.description: This feature provides core support required for the WTP Server Adapter for specific versions of the Apache Geronimo server.

feature.name: Geronimo v3.0 Server Adapter
feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapters and additional development tools for the Apache Geronimo v1.1, v2.0, v2.1, v2.2, and v3.0 servers.

feature.name: Geronimo v1.1.x Server Adapter
feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapter and additional development tools for Apache Geronimo.

feature.name: Geronimo v2.1 Server Adapter
feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapters and additional development tools for the Apache Geronimo v2.0 and v2.1 servers.

feature.name: Geronimo v2.0 Server Adapter
feature.description: This feature provides the WTP Server Adapter and additional development tools for the Apache Geronimo v2.0 server.

feature.name: SAP NetWeaver Server Adapter
feature.description: Server adapter for the SAP NetWeaver Application Server. Supports J2EE 1.4 and Java EE 5 modules.

feature.name: Jonas WTP Adapter
feature.description: JOPE (JOnAS Plugin for Eclipse) is an open source JOnAS plugin for Eclipse.

feature.name: Resin (Java EE Web Profile) Server
feature.description: Resin Eclipse Plugin based on WebTools Generic Server.

feature.name: JBoss AS, WildFly, & EAP Server Tools
feature.description: Provides WTP server adapters for JBoss installations. These adapters are capable of deployment and providing classpaths for projects. Zipped or exploded deployments, JMX integration, and other extensions are included.

feature.name: Oracle Cloud Tools
feature.description: Additional tools for developing Oracle Cloud applications.

feature.name: Oracle WebLogic Server Tools
feature.description: Tools for developing applications for Oracle WebLogic Server (versions 12.1.x, 10.3.x, 10.0 and 9.2).

feature.name: GlassFish Tools
feature.description: Tools for developing applications for GlassFish.
